title: Admission Open for 2024-25 Academic Year
content: Applications are now being accepted for the 2024-25 academic year. Visit the Admission page for more details and to download the application form.

title: Upcoming Examination Schedule
content: The final examination schedule for the current semester has been released. Please check the Downloads section for the detailed timetable.

title: Campus Maintenance Notice
content: The main building will be closed for maintenance on Saturday, May 18th. All scheduled classes will be moved to the secondary building.

title: Faculty Meeting Announcement
content: All faculty members are requested to attend the monthly meeting on Monday, May 13th at 3:00 PM in the conference hall.

title: New Library Resources Available
content: The college library has added new technical books and digital resources. Students are encouraged to visit the library to explore these resources.
